sentences.english: Organize and Formulate Post-Disaster Production and Reconstruction Program.
sentences.chinese: 組織制定災後生產重建規劃。

sentences.english: A total of 108 billion yuan has been earmarked to finance post-earthquake recovery and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 地震災後恢復重建資金1080億元。

sentences.english: He indicated that the Chinese government would continue to participate in the reconstruction of Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，中國政府將繼續積極參與馬災後重建。

sentences.english: The images reveal a city still very much coping with the aftermath of the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 圖片顯示了這座城市仍然承受着嚴重的災後餘波。

sentences.english: This intervention post-disaster is now well known.
sentences.chinese: 這種災後干預是衆所周知的。

sentences.english: WBR to take positive measures to post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: WBR採取積極的措施進行災後重建。

sentences.english: Clearly, the need to fund an additional supplementary budget for disaster reconstruction is fueling these worries some more.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，災後重建的額外追加預算帶來更多的憂慮。

sentences.english: They start in a small town in the forest of Elwynn, which has regrown since enemies destroyed it in the first Warcraft.
sentences.chinese: 他們起始於艾爾文森林的一個災後重建的小城鎮中。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the general theory problem of post-disaster recovery of urban earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了城市地震災後恢復的一般理論問題。

sentences.english: How should we motivate general publics in disaster-affected area to participate in reconstruction?
sentences.chinese: 如何調動基層人民參與災後重建的積極性。

sentences.english: The leitmotif of the disaster is cars.
sentences.chinese: 災後四處可見的是車輛。

sentences.english: Government will issue "renaissance bond" to ensure that post-disaster reconstruction funds.
sentences.chinese: 政府將發行“復興債券”，以確保災後重建的資金。

sentences.english: Yet one-on-one therapy and crisis counseling efforts are not without their risks, either.
sentences.chinese: 然而一對一的治療以及災後心理諮詢並非沒有風險。

sentences.english: But the path to recovery could be long and hard.
sentences.chinese: 不過，災後恢復可能是一個長期和艱苦的過程。

sentences.english: Fifthly, organizing cadres to go to grass-roots level units to provide guidance for post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 五是組織幹部下基層，指導災後重建工作。

sentences.english: We will continue to make earnest effort to push forward post-disaster rehabilitation and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 我們要繼續紮紮實實推進災後恢復重建工作。

definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
